readable.title: 3387661249_33e5ba0bc5
readable.content: A black horse stands in the grass at a fence , while a brown dog looks on . a black horse sticking its head through a fence trying to reach the grass . A brown dog is looking at a black horse that is sticking its head through a fence . A brown dog is looking at the black horse on the other side of the gate . A horse and dog look at each other in a field .
